text: Pepe is a 1960 Mexican American musical comedy movie directed by George Sidney and based on the play Broadway Zauber by Leslie Bush-Fekete. It stars Cantinflas, Dan Dailey, Shirley Jones, Suzanne Lloyd, Carlos Montalb√°n, Vicki Trickett, Carlos Rivas, Hank Henry, Jack Lemmon and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was nominated for 7 Academy Awards in 1961. ==Other websites== * Category:1960s epic movies Category:1960 musical movies Category:1960 comedy movies Category:American musical movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Mexican musical movies Category:Mexican comedy movies Category:Movies directed by George Sidney Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: Pepe (movie)
